description:
Dragons reign terror over the earth, sea and sky. If sworn dragon hunters like Ragna are to have any hope of dealing death to these seemingly invincible, fire-breathing beasts, they must find a way to level the odds. Ragna teams up with a mysterious man named Crimson who has likewise sworn to stand against the dragons menacing the world. But although Crimson’s motivations may be mysterious, his goal and Ragna’s perfectly align, and together they’ll fight to vanquish the dragons once and for all.

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

Note: The first episode aired with a runtime of ~47 minutes.
synonyms: ตำนานนักล่ามังกร

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Clone
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an artificial exact copy of another organism.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

tags.name: Orphan
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is an orphan.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

name.native: サイクス・シャルルーク
アイザック・スターン

node.description:
[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.

[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/大沼心) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shin_Oonuma)

After graduating from Chiyoda Institute of Technology he joined Office AO where he worked as an animator. He later joined Shaft in 2004 as a subcontractor, and he became [Akiyuki Shinbou's](https://anilist.co/staff/100089/) right hand until 2009. When he stopped working for Shaft, he found his new home at studio Silver Link, where he is to-date known as their most prominent director. Noted for directing shows such as [ef: A Tale of Melodies](https://anilist.co/anime/4789/), [Baka to Test](https://anilist.co/anime/6347/) and [Kokoro Connect](https://anilist.co/anime/11887/).

Oonuma is known to like so called moe games.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ulma_s_j) | [Website](https://ulmasoundjunction.com/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@ulmasoundjunction)

A four-piece progressive rock band with a "cinematic core" style.

Members:
- [Hisao Tamura](https://anilist.co/staff/323784/Hisao-Tamura) (田村ヒサオ), bass & vocal
- Tamotsu Kasemoto (加勢本タモツ), drums
- Yoshitaka Yamazato (山里ヨシタカ), guitar
- Shun Fukusato (福里シュン), guitar

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/pas_kun)__

__Date of Birth:__ March 6, ????
__Residency:__ Tokyo, Japan

__Introduction:__
Takumi Yoshida is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer and member of rock band [saji](https://anilist.co/staff/141414) (previously known as phatmans after school). 

__Biography:__
He made a guest vocal appearance in the Kagerou Project with the song "Kuusou Forest", which was used as an insert song in the tenth episode of anime Mekakucity Actors. The lyrics, composition and arrangement of the song were all done by Jin, also known as Shizen no Teki P.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/pas_kun)__

__Date of Birth:__ March 6, ????
__Residency:__ Tokyo, Japan

__Introduction:__
Takumi Yoshida is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer and member of rock band [saji](https://anilist.co/staff/141414) (previously known as phatmans after school). 

__Biography:__
He made a guest vocal appearance in the Kagerou Project with the song "Kuusou Forest", which was used as an insert song in the tenth episode of anime Mekakucity Actors. The lyrics, composition and arrangement of the song were all done by Jin, also known as Shizen no Teki P.

__[Website](https://saji.tokyo/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/saji_official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/saji_staff/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/sajiofficial)__

__Formed:__ December 2010 in Sapporo College of Broadcasting Arts, Music and Dance, Sapporo City, Hokkaido Prefecture, Japan
__Genres:__ Rock, Anison

__Introduction:__
saji is a Japanese three-piece rock band under record label King Records (2019–), having previously been under TOY'S FACTORY (2011–2016). They used to go under the name phatmans after school, before changing their name in July 2019.

__Members:__
- [Takumi Yoshida](https://anilist.co/staff/162404/Takumi-Yoshida) (ヨシダタクミ) – vocalist, guitarist and in-charge of lyrics and composition
- [Yoshimitsu Yamazaki](https://twitter.com/yoshimitsu_4gen) (ヤマザキヨシミツ) – bassist
- [Shinya Yuutani](https://twitter.com/flying_megane) (ユタニシンヤ) – guitarist
